Topic.Title: A Christmas Game: Ported to Inform 7

Posts.EditableText:
I have now ported my Christmas game to Inform 7.

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/0icnxg-riu2proj5l4cs3a/a-christmas-game-inform-port 

This was the first game I wrote and has been more popular than I ever thought!
